# NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the type of tab stop.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TextTabType
```

## Overview

The following mappings define the conversions between text alignment in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextTab] and tab stop types that [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextTab] defines:



## Constants

- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.leftTabStopType**: A left-aligned tab stop.
- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.rightTabStopType**: A right-aligned tab stop.
- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.centerTabStopType**: A center-aligned tab stop.
- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.decimalTabStopType**: A tab stop that aligns columns of numbers to each number’s decimal point.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing tab information

- **tabStops**: The text tab objects that represent the paragraph’s tab stops.
- **defaultTabInterval**: The documentwide default tab interval.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
